trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were 2 other sightings in San Jose on or around March 20th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I was outside taking Bodie my dog for a walk when I saw pretty much a UFO. It was hovering about 75-150 feet above me. It had 4 bright lights. 2 of which were blinking different colors. It made a whoaaaaaawlllllllll sound. Not too loud, but I could hear it. It hovered there for a bit, something like 25 seconds, then zoomed off northeast. I was outside for about an hour now waiting to catch something then I decided to report it. Thank you.
